item.title: 东方银行将以 4.9 亿美元收购 HarborOne，这是美国最新的地区性银行合并交易
item.description: 东方银行股份公司（Eastern Bankshares）周四表示，将以股票和现金的形式收购 HarborOne Bancorp，交易价值为 4.9 亿美元。【原文：Eastern Bankshares will acquire HarborOne Bancorp in a stock and cash deal valued at $490 million, the lenders said on Thursday, as bank consolidation gains traction in an uncertain market.】

item.title: 美国银行监管机构撤销对银行加密货币活动的限制
item.description: 美国银行业监管机构周四宣布撤回几份文件，这些文件敦促银行在涉足加密货币和相关活动时要谨慎行事。【原文：U.S. banking regulators announced on Thursday they were pulling back several documents that urge banks to show caution when dabbling in cryptocurrency and related activities.】

item.title: 努比亚银行扫清墨西哥银行执照申请的主要障碍
item.description: 巴西金融科技公司 Nubank 周四表示，其墨西哥分公司已获得墨西哥国家银行和证券委员会的监管批准，开始成为一家提供全面服务的银行。【原文：Brazilian fintech Nubank said on Thursday that its Mexico arm received regulatory approval from the Mexican National Banking and Securities Commission to begin the process of becoming a full-service bank.】

item.title: 数据中心需求强劲，Digital Realty 上调年度财务和利润预测
item.description: 数字房地产信托公司（Digital Realty Trust）周四上调了其年度核心运营资金（FFO）预期，押注于数据中心服务的强劲需求，使其股价在延时交易中上涨了 2%。【原文：Digital Realty Trust raised its annual core funds from operations (FFO) forecast on Thursday, betting on strong demand for data center services, sending its shares up 2% in extended trading.】

item.title: 威瑞信第一季度收入因域名需求强劲而增长
item.description: 互联网服务公司威瑞信（Verisign）周四公布第一季度收入增长 4.7%，主要得益于企业建立网上业务时对域名注册的稳定需求。【原文：Internet services company Verisign reported a 4.7% rise in first-quarter revenue on Thursday, driven by steady demand for domain registrations as businesses build their online presence.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，欧盟将对环球公司收购下城音乐公司的计划进行调查
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周四报道，欧盟委员会将对环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group）计划斥资 7.75 亿美元收购独立音乐服务公司 Downtown Music 一事进行调查，因为有人声称，这项交易将赋予该行业最大企业过多的权力。【原文：The European Commission is set to investigate Universal Music Group's planned $775 million acquisition of independent music services company Downtown Music amid claims the deal will give too much power to the industry's largest player, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 交易日：股市连续第三天反弹，财报乐观压倒关税困惑
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国计划召开阿拉斯加液化天然气峰会，敦促日本和韩国支持该项目
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士周四表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统的能源安全委员会计划于 6 月初在阿拉斯加举办一次峰会，希望日本和韩国官员届时宣布对阿拉斯加液化天然气项目的承诺。【原文：President Donald Trump's energy security council plans to host a summit in Alaska in early June, when it hopes Japanese and South Korean officials will announce commitments to the Alaska LNG project, a source familiar with the matter said on Thursday.】

item.title: 吉利德公布季度利润，收入持平，癌症销售放缓
item.description: 吉利德科学公司（Gilead Sciences）周四公布的季度收益略高于预期，营收持平，原因是艾滋病和肝病药物的销售增长以及费用紧缩抵消了癌症药物销售的下降。【原文：Gilead Sciences on Thursday reported slightly higher-than-expected quarterly earnings on flat revenue, as higher sales of drugs for HIV and liver disease along with expense tightening offset lower cancer drug sales.】

item.title: T-Mobile 无线用户增长不及预期，股价下跌
item.description: T-Mobile 周四公布的第一季度新增无线用户数量低于华尔街预期，竞争对手纷纷加大促销力度，以在竞争激烈的市场中保持领先地位。【原文：T-Mobile reported on Thursday fewer new wireless subscribers than Wall Street expected for the first quarter, as rivals dial up promotions to stay ahead in a competitive market.】

item.title: 谷歌母公司 Alphabet 回购股票，扩大股息范围，实现盈利增长
item.description: 谷歌母公司 Alphabet 周四公布的第一季度盈利高于华尔街预期，表示将回购价值 700 亿美元的股票，并将股息提高 5%。【原文：Google parent Alphabet said it would buy back $70 billion worth of shares and increase its dividend by 5% as it reported first-quarter earnings above Wall Street expectations on Thursday.】

item.title: 英特尔预计第二季度营收低于预期引发关税担忧
item.description: 周四，英特尔预测第二季度营收低于华尔街预期，为新任首席执行官陈立武执掌英特尔后的首轮财报蒙上了一层阴影，而中美贸易战正来势汹汹。【原文：Intel forecast second-quarter revenue below Wall Street estimates on Thursday, casting a shadow over new CEO Lip-Bu Tan's first round of earnings at the helm, against the backdrop of a raging Sino-U.S. trade war.】

item.title: Meta 在其 Reality Labs 部门裁员
item.description: Facebook 的所有者 Meta Platforms 公司周四表示，由于正在进行重组，该公司的 Reality Labs 部门将裁员，具体人数不详。【原文：Facebook owner Meta Platforms is laying off an unspecified number of employees from its Reality Labs division amid ongoing restructuring efforts, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 泰晤士报》报道：贝莱德首席执行官购买 "价值被低估 "的英国资产
item.description: Blackrock 首席执行官拉里-芬克（Larry Fink）表示，该公司一直在英国购买数十亿英镑的资产，并认为这些资产 "价值被低估"。【原文：Blackrock Chief Executive Officer Larry Fink said that the company has been buying billions of pounds of assets in the UK that it believes are "undervalued".】

item.title: 朝鲜网络间谍创建美国公司欺骗加密货币开发者
item.description: 据网络安全研究人员和路透社查阅的文件显示，朝鲜网络间谍在美国创建了两家公司，用恶意软件感染加密货币行业的开发人员，这违反了财政部的制裁规定。【原文：North Korean cyber spies created two businesses in the U.S., in violation of Treasury sanctions, to infect developers working in the cryptocurrency industry with malicious software, according to cybersecurity researchers and documents reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，德国默克公司接近以约 35 亿美元的价格收购 SpringWorks 公司
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四援引知情人士的话报道，德国默克公司即将以大约 35 亿美元的价格收购 SpringWorks Therapeutics 公司。【原文：Germany's Merck KGaA is nearing a roughly $3.5 billion deal for SpringWorks Therapeutics , the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日美两国财政部长就汇率问题举行会谈
item.description: 日本和美国财政部长将于周四就汇率问题举行高风险会谈，这引起了市场的关注，因为华盛顿可能会在会谈中向东京施压，要求其支撑日元并帮助东京减少美国的巨额贸易赤字。【原文：Japanese and U.S. finance chiefs meet on Thursday for high-stakes talks on exchange rates that have drawn market attention as a venue where Washington could pressure Tokyo to prop up the yen and help it reduce the huge U.S. trade deficit.】

item.title: 德鲁里称全球集装箱航运量将因特朗普贸易政策下降 1
item.description: 海事咨询公司德鲁里（Drewry）周四表示，由于美国贸易政策的直接影响，该公司预计全球集装箱港口吞吐量将下降 1%。【原文：Maritime consultancy Drewry said on Thursday that it expects global container port volume to fall 1% as a direct result of U.S. trade policies.】

item.title: 墨西哥装瓶商 Arca Continental 第一季度盈利增长，销量下降
item.description: 墨西哥装瓶商 Arca Continental 周四公布第一季度盈利增长，原因是价格上涨有助于抵消各市场饮料销量的下降。【原文：Mexican bottler Arca Continental reported a rise in first-quarter earnings on Thursday, as price hikes helped to offset a drop in beverage volumes across its markets.】

item.title: 消息人士称，华尔街监管机构去年裁员 16%，其中包括关键部门
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，自去年此时以来，美国证券交易委员会已流失了 16% 的员工，在市场动荡之际，华尔街最高监管机构的关键部门出现了缺口。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has lost 16% of its workforce since this time last year, two sources briefed on the matter said, leaving Wall Street's top regulator with gaps across key divisions at a time of market turmoil.】

item.title: 晨星公司称，特朗普议程导致全球可持续基金资金外流创历史新高
item.description: 研究机构晨星公司（Morningstar）周四表示，第一季度投资者从全球可持续基金中撤资86亿美元，创下历史新高。【原文：Investors withdrew a record $8.6 billion from global sustainable funds in the first quarter, researcher Morningstar said on Thursday, attributing the outflows largely to the shift against climate and social initiatives by U.S. President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 摩根大通将 227 名员工晋升为主要银行部门的 MD 级员工
item.description: 根据路透社周四看到的一份备忘录，摩根大通已将其商业与投资银行（CIB）部门的 227 名员工晋升为令人羡慕的董事总经理。【原文：JPMorgan Chase has promoted 227 employees in its commercial and investment bank (CIB) division to the coveted role of managing director, according to a memo seen by Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 调查发现，第一季度房地产市场情绪降幅为大流行病以来最大
item.description: 一项最新调查显示，受美国总统唐纳德-特朗普新关税政策的影响，美国商业地产融资市场的乐观情绪在第一季度出现了有史以来第二大跌幅。【原文：Optimism in the U.S. market for commercial real estate financing witnessed its second largest drop ever in the first quarter, triggered by President Donald Trump's new tariff policies, a new survey found.】

item.title: 消息人士称，印度航空正在与波音公司谈判，以购买被中国航空公司冷落的 10 架飞机
item.description: 两位熟悉讨论情况的人士告诉路透社，印度航空公司正在与美国飞机制造商波音公司洽谈购买约10架737 MAX喷气式飞机，因为在与美国的贸易战中，中国客户开始拒绝交付飞机。【原文：Air India is in talks with U.S. planemaker Boeing to acquire around 10 737 MAX jets after Chinese customers started rejecting deliveries amid a trade war with the United States, two people familiar with the discussions told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国机构将放宽自动驾驶汽车部署障碍，保留报告规则
item.description: 特朗普政府周四表示，它的目标是加快自动驾驶汽车的部署，但将维持要求报告涉及先进车辆的安全事故的规定。【原文：The Trump administration said Thursday it aims to speed up the deployment of self-driving vehicles but will maintain rules requiring reporting of safety incidents involving advanced vehicles.】

item.title: 宝洁依靠价值 380 美元的电动牙刷和升级版剃须刀抵消关税
item.description: 宝洁公司（Procter & Gamble）打赌，消费者会掏钱购买价格较高的 380 美元电动牙刷、改良版帮宝适尿布和袖珍型总是护垫，以抵消特朗普政府反复无常的关税政策带来的新成本。【原文：Procter & Gamble is betting consumers will shell out for $380 electric toothbrushes, spruced-up Pampers diapers and pocket-sized Always pads, which command higher prices, to offset new costs from the Trump administration's erratic tariff policy.】

item.title: 中国保险经纪元宝网在贸易紧张局势下赴美上市，目标估值6.76亿美元
item.description: 中国保险经纪公司元宝周四表示，在美国宣布征收新关税导致经济不确定性和IPO上市放缓的情况下，该公司在美国首次公开募股的目标估值最高可达6.763亿美元。【原文：Chinese insurance broker Yuanbao said on Thursday that it was targeting a valuation of up to $676.3 million in its U.S. initial public offering, amid economic uncertainty and a slowdown in IPO listings following the announcement of new U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: BPM 银行正式拒绝联合信贷银行的收购要约
item.description: 意大利第三大银行 Banco BPM 周四正式拒绝了更大竞争对手意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）的收购要约，称收购价格过低，其股东将在合并后的实体中受到惩罚。【原文：Italy's third-largest bank Banco BPM on Thursday formally rejected a takeover bid by bigger rival UniCredit , saying the price was too low and that its shareholders would be penalised in the combined entity.】

item.title: 消息人士称特朗普将于周四签署深海采矿行政令
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）预计将于周四签署一项行政命令，以促进深海采矿业的发展，这是他开发国际镍、铜和其他广泛应用于经济领域的重要矿产资源的最新尝试。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is expected to sign an executive order on Thursday to boost the deep-sea mining industry, the latest attempt to tap international deposits of nickel, copper and other critical minerals used widely across the economy.】

item.title: 米其林第一季度销售额降幅低于预期
item.description: 法国轮胎制造商米其林公布的第一季度销售额降幅略低于预期，原因是原装设备销量的减少被替换零件销量的增加部分抵消。【原文：French tyre maker Michelin reported a slightly smaller than expected drop in first-quarter sales as lower original equipment volumes were partly offset by higher replacement parts.】
